summary: Synthesized sorry elimination analysis: 3 fundamental blockers identified (false lemmas, extension incompatibility, gap case), 5 candidate solutions evaluated with recommendations

artifacts.summary: Path forward synthesis: fundamental blockers (false lemmas, extension incompatibility, gap case) and 5 candidate solutions for sorry-free proof with decision matrix

fundamental_blockers: multi_witness_seed_consistent_future/past are mathematically FALSE (counterexample: F(p) and F(neg p) in same MCS)
Universal forward_F is INCOMPATIBLE with domain extension (conflicting obligations block extension)
non_total_has_boundary is FALSE for domains with internal gaps (e.g., Z \ {0})
solvable: Cross-sign seed consistency (line 888) - all elements collect into mcs(s_min)
recommended_options: Option A: Accept technical debt (low effort, high debt)
Option B: Pivot to DovetailingChain (medium effort, 4 sorries)
Option C: Combined one-at-a-time + GH-controlled Lindenbaum (very high effort, potentially sorry-free)
findings.primary_recommendation: User choice between Option A (document debt) or Option B (pivot to DovetailingChain)
